title: Device
name: Device
description: An object to store the information about the device we're working with.

parameters.name: name
parameters.notes: A name to identify the device

parameters.name: address
parameters.notes: The address of the device you wish to connect to. E.g.: "08:00:69:02:01:FC" for bluetooth or "192.168.1.105" for ethernet.

parameters.name: connectionMethod
parameters.notes: Enumerated type to specify the type of connection with the device. E.g: Bluetooth, Serial, etc...

parameters.name: sharedSecret
parameters.notes: This is used if you want this specific device to use the specified sharedSecret instead of the default one proviced in the initialization.

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.notes: The amount of miliseconds to consider the connection has timed out. If not set, the default timeout is 15 seconds.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: An unique identifier of the device.

example.code:
//Create and init a new Device
Device dev = new Device("CardReader7", "08:00:69:02:01:FC", "1", ConnectionMethod.BLUETOOTH);
